rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious, wheelchair-accessible lobby with a grand staircase and elevator access to upper floors. Vastu-compliant entrance placed in the north-east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Mediterranean-style open living area merging with the kitchen. Features wide doorways, slip-resistant flooring, and ample natural light to ensure accessibility. Open-plan design as per request.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully integrated kitchen adjoining the living room. Equipped with modern appliances, accessible countertops, and a wheelchair-friendly layout ensuring easy movement.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible guest bathroom featuring grab bars and non-slip surfaces. Designed to be near the entrance for convenience and Vastu compliance (north-west corner).

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining area within the living space, ensuring ease of movement with wheelchair-accessible seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gymnasium integrated into the ground floor for privacy and convenience. Accessible design includes adjustable equipment placement and ample open space.

openings.description: Large windows to allow natural light, enhance the Mediterranean aesthetic and promote ventilation in line with Vastu principles (eastern direction).
Additional window complementing the east wall windows for balanced light distribution.
Wheelchair-accessible door ensuring smooth transition from exterior to interior, aligned with Vastu guidelines.

notes.vastu_considerations: Central courtyard is planned on the upper level for natural ventilation and energy flow. The layout adheres to traditional Mediterranean aesthetics while integrating Indian building norms and Vastu principles.
notes.wheelchair_accessibility: All doorways, hallways, and rooms are designed with wheelchair accessibility in mind, featuring ramps where necessary.
